answers.answer: Hello.Can you mention since when you are having the symptoms? These may be symptoms of peripheral neuropathy due to either vitamin deficiency, diabetes or nerve compression at the spine.Regards

question: I don't know why the skin on both of my forearms, and the tops of my hands, has gone numb. When something brushes against these areas, it feels like I'm wearing thin-layered gloves. Have you any ideas of what might be causing this?cheers
title: Veenus
